duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop financial dashboards using DAX programming languages and Power BI Report Builder.
Create reports and dashboards for financial and leadership teams, focusing on revenue percentages and the Profit and Loss statement.
Ensure consistency in the design and functionality of dashboards across the team.
Collaborate with the director of the financial teams to prioritize and vet financial reports.
Work with the CIO to meet the reporting requirements of the financial and leadership teams.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
